title: Golden Healer Medicine
cleaned_text: Small office setting with an emphasis on keeping everyone safe from COVID-19 while providing individualized care. Acupuncture Chiropractic Herbal Medicine Combination treatments to bridge the gap in traditional health care. Dr. Glenda Culbertson is dual licensed as both an acupuncturist and chiropractic physician. She practices in Portland, Oregon. She believes a multifaceted strategy may yield improved results to meet your health care needs! She finds acupuncture especially helpful for stress related conditions and to speed the healing of acute injuries. With an extensive background in sports that include rock climbing, nordic skiing, and trail running, she loves helping people get back to their preferred activities after being sidelined due to injury. Herbal Therapy can provide daily support to balance your body, mind and spirit. Dr. Culbertson can provide a treatment plan that may incorporate herbs from either [Kan Herbs](https://www.kanherb.com) or [Standard Process](https://www.standardprocess.com). Both are highly respected companies with an emphasis on purity and effectiveness. Treatment for Motor Vehicle Accidents. Dr. Culbertson can provide holistic strategies to treat injuries related to motor vehicle accidents by combining chiropractic, acupuncture and herbal therapies. She may recommend massage as well.
